commit.message:
gimple-pretty-print.c (dump_gimple_phi): Dump alias info.

2010-04-16  Richard Guenther  <rguenther@suse.de>

	* gimple-pretty-print.c (dump_gimple_phi): Dump alias info.
	(dump_gimple_stmt): Likewise.

From-SVN: r158406
